summary: The request is in response to President Biden’s executive order in March asking for agencies to coordinate their approach to digital assets.
title: Commerce Dept. Asks for Public Comments on Framework for US Crypto Competitiveness
content: The U.S. Department of Commerce’s International Trade Administration is seeking public comments on how it can respond to President Joe Biden’s executive order on crypto, according to a notice issued on Thursday.
Read more: The US and Europe Can't Regulate Crypto Alone
